channel.title: Privacy on Rukshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Rukshan's Blog

item.title: They launched a website to register covid vaccinations, but it only lasted one week
item.description: When it comes to IT in this country we are not having a great year, especially when it comes to IT involving health and security.

item.title: The value of targeted advertising
item.description: This post will might be the post that will roast me the most. But before triggering your fingers just by reading the title I would like everyone to read my post, and read my argument before jumping in to conclusions.
